name: Spicy Lentil Taco Soup
description: Rich ‘n creamy, this soup is as satisfying as it is quick ‘n easy. It takes just 20 minutes to throw together and uses a handful of pantry staples like crushed tomatoes and lentils. Our feisty Taco Seasoning really packs the heat!
preparation: In a sauté pan, combine first four ingredients; bring to a boil and simmer 20 min.
Ladle soup into four bowls. Top with avocado, cheese, and a dollop of yogurt.
Garnish with tortilla chips and desired toppings.
tips: To give the soup more body and robust texture, purée half, and then stir back in before serving.
Make it with 2 tbsp of Taco or Fajita Seasoning.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: serve with 2 cups leafy green salad and 1 tbsp prepared Epicure dressing.

products.name: Taco Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Taco night never tasted so delicious! Wave adios to too much sodium and taste the fullness of this well-balanced blend of cumin, oregano, and chili powder – with a mild heat, it’s kid-friendly. Just add the seasoning to lean ground meat for a saucy affair that holds together while you scoop it into taco shells. Our only question – soft or hard shell?

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavor as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: Fajita Seasoning
summary: A lively, mild blend for seasoning beef, chicken, or fish fajitas & enchiladas.
